content: {"Name": "Pittstown Area Food Pantry", "Entity_Id": 80, "Category": "Food Pantry", "Subcategory": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "Organization": "Pittstown Area Food Pantry", "More_Information": "Once a month for full order, partial order any other time no limit Guests enter for client choice, no restrictions", "Counties": ["Rensselaer"], "Location": "Valley Falls", "Address": "97 Tomhannock Road", "City": "Valley Falls", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12185", "Phone": "(518) 258-8213", "Hours_of_Operation": "Tues 6:30-7:30pm, Sat 9:00am-10:00am", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "", "Website": "http://pittstownareafoodpantry.weebly.com/", "Coalition": 1, "CFAN": 0, "Latitude": "42.869633", "Longitude": "-73.547808", "Last_Updated": "02-06-2024", "icon": "marker-F42000", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
